        Ambusher constructor inherit from ghost.
        Creat Ambusher instance with necessary variables.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate x.
        y - coordinate y.
        sprite - Ghost image.
        MapObjects - A list conatin all mapObjects(), the objects could not move in the game.
        waka - The waka
        Intersections - A list of intersections node where ghosts could make a ture.
        ModeTime - The different mode time read from json file.
        GameOriData - The game original Data read from json(i.e. speed).
        ImgMap - All images need to be used in this gmae.
